reports.title: XPRO (Expro Group) - Deep Dive
reports.summary: International oilfield services with 6.5% D/E, strong fit for energy demand thesis. Trading at 22.7x P/E with $2.3B backlog.

reports.title: OXY (Occidental Petroleum) - Deep Dive
reports.summary: Buffett-backed oil major with carbon capture optionality (STRATOS). 30x P/E is stretched but downside protected.

reports.title: APTV (Aptiv) - Deep Dive
reports.summary: Auto supplier spinning off EDS by March 2026. Post-spin RemainCo is higher-margin ADAS/connected car play.

reports.title: NNE (Nano Nuclear) - Deep Dive
reports.summary: Pre-revenue microreactor developer targeting AI data center power. $580M cash, 3+ year runway. High risk/reward.

reports.title: CVNA (Carvana) - Underwater Loan Analysis
reports.summary: 44% of loans underwater, subprime stress at GFC levels, related party concerns. 86x P/E prices in perfection.

reports.title: The IRL Trade - Live Events Thesis
reports.summary: Live sports/events investment thesis. People value IRL experiences, premium on live events.

reports.title: AI Victims Trade - Short Thesis
reports.summary: Betting against companies vulnerable to AI disruption - legacy database, language learning, creative tools.

reports.title: FNMA/FMCC Exit Analysis
reports.summary: GSE conservatorship exit analysis and trade considerations.

reports.title: IRM Short Thesis
reports.summary: Iron Mountain short thesis - document storage disruption.

reports.title: ChartBoi OXY Technical Analysis
reports.summary: Technical chart analysis for OXY positioning.
